title: Develop API endpoints
description: Implement RESTful API endpoints for core system functionalities.

subtasks.title: Define API requirements and core functionalities
Design API endpoint structure and routes
Set up API project structure in the codebase
Develop CRUD operations for core entities
Validate request payloads and handle errors
Write unit tests for API endpoints
Integrate API with database and services
Perform end-to-end testing of API functionalities

details: Follow best practices for API design and include proper documentation.

factors.name: dependencyCount
